mapper.select: select count(bill_id) as billCount ,sum(ZERO_MONEY) as zeroMoney ,sum(INVOICE) as invoice, sum(DISC_MONEY) as discMoney from TQXY.T_XY_BILL t where t.STATDATE = #{start,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT ISNULL(sum(MONEY) ,0) AS money, ISNULL(sum(FREE_MONEY) ,0) AS freeMoney FROM TQPOS.T_HY_ACCOLIST WHERE STATDATE between #{start,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{end,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and INOUT =1 and oper_sort in( 1 ,4) and STATUS <> -1
SELECT ISNULL(sum(MONEY) ,0) AS consumeMoney FROM TQPOS.T_HY_ACCOLIST WHERE STATDATE between #{start,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{end,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and INOUT = -1 and oper_sort = -1 and STATUS <> -1

SELECT ISNULL(SUM ( CASE WHEN SALE_SORT_ID = '01' THEN DISC_MONEY_DIS ELSE 0 END ),0) AS fangfeiRetMoney, ISNULL(SUM ( CASE WHEN SALE_SORT_ID <> '01' THEN DISC_MONEY_DIS ELSE 0 END ),0) AS xiaofeiRetMoney FROM TQPOS.T_POS_SALECHANGED_LOG WHERE OPER_STATDATE = #{start,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select sum(case when PAY_MODE_ID='1006' then PAY_MONEY else 0 end) as payMoneyA, sum(case when PAY_MODE_ID='1008' then PAY_MONEY else 0 end) as zhaodaiMoney, sum(case when PAY_MODE_ID='0002' then PAY_MONEY else 0 end) as payMoneyC from TQXY.T_XY_PAYLIST where BILL_STATDATE = #{start,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
